name: It's Time to Go Home
description:
It's Time to Go Home A game about enjoying the journey.    Gamepad Support

   5 Minute Playtime

   Friendly Moon Rocks





Play as an astronaut stuck on the Moon, looking for a way back to Earth.

This game is made using Phaser 3. Check out the source code here!

The music is composed by John Oestmann. Check out his work here!

Finally, if you like the project and would like to connect with me, I'm on Twitter as @BadMojoVeryBad. Thanks for playing 😊
